## App.saveLocalStorage() method

Save vault-specific value to `localStorage`<!-- -->. If data is `null`<!-- -->, the entry will be cleared.

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveLocalStorage(key: string, data: unknown | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>key</code> | <code>string</code> |  |
|  <code>data</code> | <code>unknown &#124; null</code> | <p>value being saved to localStorage. Must be serializable.</p><p> 1.8.7</p> |

**Returns:**

`void`
